original_title: 超新星フラッシュマン 大逆転! タイタンボーイ!!
overview: Big Rally! Titan Boy! is the second movie of Choushinsei Flashman. It is a theatrical edit of episodes 15 to 18: The Giant Robo is Worn Out, The Human Minimini Plan, The Mysterious Giant Reckless Car! and Big Turnaround! The Transforming Robo.
title: Choushinsei Flashman: Big Rally! Titan Boy!
